comparable.translation[0].definitions[0]: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison
A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
comparable figures for the same period of time last year
Pluto is comparable in size to the Moon.
comparable.translation[0].definitions[1]: being equally important, good, bad etc
These two artists just aren’t comparable.
His poetry is hardly comparable with Shakespeare’s.
